title: China retail sales beat forecasts in October while real estate slump worsens
content: Retail sales grew by 4.8% year-on-year, the National Bureau of Statistics said Friday. That was above the 3.8% forecasted in a Reuters poll, and a pickup from 3.2% growth in September.
summary: Retail sales grew by 4.8% year-on-year, the National Bureau of Statistics said Friday. That was above the 3.8% forecasted in a Reuters poll, and a pickup from 3.2% growth in September.

title: Japan GDP expands by 0.3% in third quarter, snapping two quarters of year-on-year declines
content: GDP rose 0.2% on a quarter-on-quarter basis, while also expanding 0.9% on an annualized basis.
summary: GDP rose 0.2% on a quarter-on-quarter basis, while also expanding 0.9% on an annualized basis.

title: Powell says the Fed doesn't need to be 'in a hurry' to reduce interest rates
content: "The strength we are currently seeing in the economy gives us the ability to approach our decisions carefully," Powell said.
summary: "The strength we are currently seeing in the economy gives us the ability to approach our decisions carefully," Powell said.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Powell’s comments drag investors down to earth from postelection high
content: Investors riding high on the postelection rally and are now dragged down to earth by interest rate concerns, their landing sure feels like a bumpy one.
summary: Investors riding high on the postelection rally and are now dragged down to earth by interest rate concerns, their landing sure feels like a bumpy one.

title: India’s central bank chief warns growing risk of global inflation returning
content: Central banks have managed to engineer a soft landing, but there is still a risk of global inflation returning, according to India's central bank chief.
summary: Central banks have managed to engineer a soft landing, but there is still a risk of global inflation returning, according to India's central bank chief.

title: Trump victory drives gold to near 2-month lows as investors pile into equities, cryptocurrencies
content: The recent slide — gold has declined in six of the seven sessions since Trump's victory — follows a series of record-breaking milestones for bullion over the past year.
summary: The recent slide — gold has declined in six of the seven sessions since Trump's victory — follows a series of record-breaking milestones for bullion over the past year.

title: I became CEO of a company that has helped millions of kids read—here's my no. 1 piece of career advice

title: WikiLeaks whistleblower Chelsea Manning says censorship is still 'a dominant threat'

title: The season's hottest gift? A travel 'experience' —  here's how to buy one

title: Trump picks vaccine skeptic RFK Jr. for Health and Human Services secretary
content: Donald Trump had said that if elected president he would have Robert F. Kennedy Jr. "go wild on health." HHS oversees Medicare, Medicaid, CDC and FDA.
summary: Donald Trump had said that if elected president he would have Robert F. Kennedy Jr. "go wild on health." HHS oversees Medicare, Medicaid, CDC and FDA.

title: Trump attorney general pick Matt Gaetz under scrutiny as House Ethics report on sex and drug claims takes focus
content: GOP Sen. John Cornyn said he "absolutely" wants to see the House Ethics Committee report on Matt Gaetz, President-elect Donald Trump's attorney general pick.

title: Embattled fashion house Burberry reveals massive overhaul sending shares to an all-time high
content: Burberry is aiming to boost waning sales by refocusing on heritage designs and statement pieces under sweeping revamp plans announced Thursday.
summary: Burberry is aiming to boost waning sales by refocusing on heritage designs and statement pieces under sweeping revamp plans announced Thursday.

title: Disney earnings offer hope that streaming can successfully supplant linear TV
content: Disney projects entertainment direct-to-consumer operating income will increase by about $875 million next year over fiscal year 2024.

title: Trump may cede global climate leadership to China
content: As Republicans eye a red sweep, the U.S. could announce its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement as soon as early 2025 and complete it by beginning of 2026.
summary: As Republicans eye a red sweep, the U.S. could announce its withdrawal from the Paris Agreement as soon as early 2025 and complete it by beginning of 2026.

title: Here's the deflation breakdown for October 2024 — in one chart
content: There are still some pockets of deflation in the U.S. economy, though the dynamic has become more muted as supply chains normalize, economists said.

title: Here's what the U.S.' enemies — and allies — might see from Marco Rubio as secretary of State

title: Britain's car finance industry is in crisis – with banks bracing for billions in payouts

title: AMD to lay off 4% of workforce, or about 1,000 employees
